if (type(value) == "table") then table_dump(value) elseif (type(value) == "nil") then debug (" = NIL") else what (value) end end end

utility.name: what
utility.description: Prints information on any variable passed in as argument, useful if you need to find out what you are dealing with

utilityMethods.utility:
-- -- Print methods for an object -- function what(o) info = class_info(o) if info ~= nil then ret = "Object type [" .. info.name .. "]
-----------------------------------------------------------------

".."Members:
"
if info.name == "table" then table_dump(o) end
for k, v in pairs(info.methods) do ret = ret .. string.format ("	%30s:	%5s
", k, type(v)) end ret = ret .. "

Attributes:
" for k, v in pairs(info.attributes) do ret = ret .. string.format ("	%30s:	%5s
", k, type(v)) end ret = ret .. "
-----------------------------------------------------------------" end
debug (ret) return ret end

utility.name: how
utility.description: Prints all available lua classes bound from Ctrlr

utilityMethods.utility:
-- -- Print all available classes -- function how() ret = "Available classes:
" ret = ret .. "
-----------------------------------------------------------------" for i,v in ipairs(class_names()) do ret = ret .. "	".. v .. "
" end ret = ret .. "
-----------------------------------------------------------------" debug (ret) return ret end
